title: Extreme Undead Collection
description: Four zombie novellas in one release!"Highway To Hell" - Randy just wanted to survive, run away from the zombies, and hide... until he met a mysterious and sexy girl..."Darlene Zombie Killer" - the collected short stories of Darlene Bobich leading up to "Dying Days"..."Dying Days" - Darlene Bobich, Florida sun and zombies... what better combination?..."Zombie Tea Party" - zombie short story collection...nearly 100,000 words in all... extreme situations, extreme violence... extreme undead...
author: Armand Rosamilia
